DOC.detailed_description: In recent year prevalence obesity increase reach epidemic level . Obesity define excess accumulation body fat arise sustained periodic positive energy balance energy intake exceeds energy expenditure . Overweight obesity base Body Mass Index ( BMI ) Accordingly World Health Organization ( WHO ) classify individual BMI 25-29.99 kg/m2 overweight individual BMI≥ 30 kg/m2 term obese . Apart major contributor chronic disease burden mortality , obesity-particularly abdominal obesity , also closely related metabolic syndrome , cluster disease encompass follow condition Dyslipidemia , Hypertension Glucose intolerance insulin resistance.Abdominal obesity The World Health Organization predict 2.3 billion overweight adult world 2015 , 700 million obese . Worldwide obesity double since 1980 . In 2008 , 1.5 billion adult , 20 year age old , overweight . Of , 200 million men nearly 300 million woman obese . Over 65 % world population live country overweight obesity kill people underweight . Overweight obesity become serious health concern . Diﬀerent weight management strategy presently utilized variety weight loss supplement sell `` slimming aid '' readily available . However , eﬃcacy food supplement remain uncertain . With high cost prescription weight loss drug fear side effect , general public turning nutraceuticals . One supplement green coﬀee extract ( GCE ) .GCE present green raw coﬀee . Coffee ( Coffea L. ) world 's favourite beverage second-most trade commodity oil . In 2009/10 coffee account export worth estimate US $ 15.4 billion , 93.4 million bag ship , total coffee sector employment estimate 26 million people 52 produce country . Arabica coffee ( Coffea arabica L. ) robusta coffee ( C. canephora Pierre ex A.Froehner ) two main specie use production coffee . 66 % world production mostly come Coffea arabica L. 34 % Coffea canephora .
